QueryResult.text: select pfm_portfolios.id odf_pk, PFM_PORTFOLIOS.ID as portfolio_key, PFM_PORTFOLIOS.ID as clarity_portfolio_key, pfm_portfolios.CODE as portfolio_id, pfm_portfolios.NAME as portfolio_name, pfm_portfolios.DESCRIPTION as description, CMN_DATE_TRUNC_FCT(PFM_PORTFOLIOS.SYNC_DATE) as last_sync_date, pfm_portfolios.SYNCSCHEDULE as sync_schedule, CMN_DATE_TRUNC_FCT(PFM_PORTFOLIOS.START_DATE) as start_date, COP_CALC_FINISH_FCT(PFM_PORTFOLIOS.FINISH_DATE) as finish_date, null as managers_key, null as stakeholders_key, pfm_portfolios.CAPACITY_UNIT_TYPE as pfm_capacity_unit_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PMA_CAPACITY_UNIT_TYPE' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_CODE = pfm_portfolios.CAPACITY_UNIT_TYPE) as cap_unit_type_caption, pfm_portfolios.COST_HEALTH as pfm_cost_health_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PFM_COST_HEALTH' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = pfm_portfolios.COST_HEALTH) as cost_health_caption, pfm_portfolios.SCHEDULE_HEALTH as pfm_schedule_health_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PFM_SCHEDULE_HEALTH' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = pfm_portfolios.SCHEDULE_HEALTH) as schedule_health_caption, pfm_portfolios.RESOURCE_HEALTH as pfm_resource_health_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PFM_RESOURCE_HEALTH' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = pfm_portfolios.RESOURCE_HEALTH) as resource_health_caption, pfm_portfolios.GOAL_ALIGNMENT as pfm_goal_align_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PFM_GOAL_ALIGNMENT' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = pfm_portfolios.GOAL_ALIGNMENT) as goal_alignment_caption, pfm_portfolios.INNOVATION_LEVEL as pfm_innov_level_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PFM_INNOVATION_LEVEL' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = pfm_portfolios.INNOVATION_LEVEL) as innovation_level_caption, pfm_portfolios.PROBABILITY_SUCCESS as pfm_probab_success_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PFM_PROBABILITY_SUCCESS' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = pfm_portfolios.PROBABILITY_SUCCESS) as probability_success_caption, pfm_portfolios.RISK as pfm_risk_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'PFM_RISK' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_ENUM = pfm_portfolios.RISK) as risk_caption, pfm_portfolios.CURRENCY_CODE as currency_code, pfm_portfolios.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, PFM_PORTFOLIOS.CREATED_DATE as clarity_created_date, PFM_PORTFOLIOS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as clarity_updated_date, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from pfm_portfolios pfm_portfolios inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
